Text:
Let us Pray.
Lord, we pray that you will visit this house and drive far away every snare of the enemy. [t] Make welcome your holy angles to live here and to sustain our peace. [*] May your blessings remain with us forever. Through Jesus Christ our Lord.
Amen.

Extra.BreviaryInstructions: For the Easter Triduum, and Solemnities occurring during the week.

Changes: 2022-08-01 - Paul Prins: Change abbreviation and add instructions.
